Initializer# init(device:resultImages:resultsAreNeeded:)

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
init?(
    device: any MTLDevice,
    resultImages: [MPSNNImageNode],
    resultsAreNeeded areResultsNeeded: UnsafeMutablePointer<ObjCBool>?
)
```
